    3. Warning: 08/09 is not a legal ECMA-262 octal constant
    4. RangeError: radix must be an integer
    5. SyntaxError: invalid regular expression flag "x"
    6. SyntaxError: return not in function
    7. RangeError: BigInt division by zero
    8. RangeError: BigInt negative exponent
    9. TypeError: X.prototype.y called on incompatible type
    10. ReferenceError: can't access lexical declaration 'X' before initialization
    11. TypeError: can't assign to property "x" on "y": not an object
    12. RangeError: x can't be converted to BigInt because it isn't an integer
    13. TypeError: can't convert BigInt to number
    14. TypeError: can't convert x to BigInt
    15. TypeError: can't define property "x": "obj" is not extensible
    16. TypeError: property "x" is non-configurable and can't be deleted
    17. TypeError: can't redefine non-configurable property "x"
    18. SyntaxError: cannot use `??` unparenthesized within `||` and `&&` expressions
    19. TypeError: cyclic object value
    20. TypeError: can't access dead object
    21. SyntaxError: applying the 'delete' operator to an unqualified name is deprecated
    22. ReferenceError: deprecated caller or arguments usage
    23. Warning: expression closures are deprecated
    24. SyntaxError: "0"-prefixed octal literals and octal escape seq. are deprecated
    25. SyntaxError: Using //@ to indicate sourceURL pragmas is deprecated. Use //# instead
    26. Warning: String.x is deprecated; use String.prototype.x instead
    27. Warning: Date.prototype.toLocaleFormat is deprecated
    28. SyntaxError: test for equality (==) mistyped as assignment (=)?
    29. TypeError: setting getter-only property "x"
    30. SyntaxError: Unexpected '#' used outside of class body
    31. SyntaxError: identifier starts immediately after numeric literal
    32. SyntaxError: illegal character
    33. TypeError: cannot use 'in' operator to search for 'x' in 'y'
    34. RangeError: invalid array length
    35. SyntaxError: invalid assignment left-hand side
    36. SyntaxError: invalid BigInt syntax
    37. TypeError: invalid assignment to const "x"
    38. RangeError: invalid date
    39. SyntaxError: for-in loop head declarations may not have initializers
    40. SyntaxError: a declaration in the head of a for-of loop can't have an initializer
    41. TypeError: invalid 'instanceof' operand 'x'
    42. TypeError: 'x' is not iterable
    43. SyntaxError: JSON.parse: bad parsing
    44. SyntaxError: Malformed formal parameter
    45. URIError: malformed URI sequence
    46. SyntaxError: missing ] after element list
    47. SyntaxError: missing : after property id
    48. SyntaxError: missing } after function body
    49. SyntaxError: missing } after property list
    50. SyntaxError: missing formal parameter
    51. SyntaxError: missing = in const declaration
    52. SyntaxError: missing name after . operator
    53. SyntaxError: missing ) after argument list
    54. SyntaxError: missing ) after condition
    55. SyntaxError: missing ; before statement
    56. TypeError: More arguments needed
    57. RangeError: repeat count must be non-negative
    58. TypeError: "x" is not a non-null object
    59. TypeError: "x" has no properties
    60. SyntaxError: missing variable name
    61. TypeError: can't delete non-configurable array element
    62. RangeError: argument is not a valid code point
    63. TypeError: "x" is not a constructor
    64. TypeError: "x" is not a function
    65. ReferenceError: "x" is not defined
    66. RangeError: precision is out of range
    67. Error: Permission denied to access property "x"
    68. TypeError: "x" is read-only
    69. SyntaxError: redeclaration of formal parameter "x"
    70. TypeError: Reduce of empty array with no initial value
    71. SyntaxError: "x" is a reserved identifier
    72. RangeError: repeat count must be less than infinity
    73. Warning: unreachable code after return statement
    74. SyntaxError: "use strict" not allowed in function with non-simple parameters
    75. InternalError: too much recursion
    76. ReferenceError: assignment to undeclared variable "x"
    77. ReferenceError: reference to undefined property "x"
    78. SyntaxError: Unexpected token
    79. TypeError: "x" is (not) "y"
    80. SyntaxError: function statement requires a name
    81. SyntaxError: unparenthesized unary expression can't appear on the left-hand side of '**'
    82. SyntaxError: unterminated string literal

value.content: 본 페이지는 자바스크립트의 제외 예정인(즉, 아직 사용할 수 있지만 제거 계획이 있는) 기능과 제외된(즉, 더 이상 사용할 수 없는) 기능을 나열합니다.

value.title: 제외 예정 기능
value.content: 아래 기능은 아직 사용할 수 있지만, 언젠가 제거될 예정이므로 주의를 기울여야 합니다. 작성한 코드가 항목 중 하나를 포함하고 있다면 제거해야 합니다.

value.title: RegExp 속성
value.content:
아래 속성은 제외 예정입니다. 이는 String.replace 사용에 영향을 주지 않습니다.

Property Description
$1-$9

Parenthesized substring matches, if any.
Warning: Using these properties can result in problems, since browser extensions can modify them. Avoid them!

$_ (en-US) See input.
$* (en-US) See multiline.
$& (en-US) See lastMatch.
$+ (en-US) See lastParen.
$` (en-US) See leftContext.
$' (en-US) See rightContext.
input (en-US) The string against which a regular expression is matched.
lastMatch (en-US) The last matched characters.
lastParen (en-US) The last parenthesized substring match, if any.
leftContext (en-US) The substring preceding the most recent match.
rightContext (en-US) The substring following the most recent match.

The following are now properties of RegExp instances, no longer of the RegExp object:

Property Description
global (en-US) Whether or not to test the regular expression against all possible matches in a string, or only against the first.
ignoreCase (en-US) Whether or not to ignore case while attempting a match in a string.
lastIndex (en-US) The index at which to start the next match.
multiline (en-US) Whether or not to search in strings across multiple lines.
source (en-US) 패턴의 텍스트.

value.title: RegExp 메서드
value.content:
• compile() (en-US) 메서드는 제외될 예정입니다.
  • valueOf 메서드는 더 이상 RegExp 전용이 아닙니다. Object.valueOf()를 사용하세요.

value.title: Function 속성
value.content: • The caller (en-US) and arguments properties are deprecated, because they leak the function caller. Instead of the arguments property, you should use the arguments object inside function closures.

value.title: Legacy generator
value.content:
• Legacy generator function statement (en-US) and Legacy generator function expression (en-US) are deprecated. Use function* statement and function* expression instead.
  • JS1.7/JS1.8 Array comprehension (en-US) and JS1.7/JS1.8 Generator comprehension (en-US) are deprecated.

value.title: Iterator
value.content:
• StopIteration is deprecated.
  • Iterator is deprecated.

value.title: Object methods
value.content:
• watch and unwatch are deprecated. Use Proxy instead.
  • __iterator__ is deprecated.
  • __noSuchMethod__ is deprecated. Use Proxy instead.

value.title: Date methods
value.content:
• getYear (en-US) and setYear (en-US) are affected by the Year-2000-Problem and have been subsumed by getFullYear and setFullYear.
  • You should use toISOString instead of the deprecated toGMTString (en-US) method in new code.
  • toLocaleFormat is deprecated.

value.title: Functions
value.content: • Expression closures are deprecated. Use regular functions or arrow functions instead.

value.title: Proxy
value.content:
• Proxy.create and Proxy.createFunction are deprecated. Use Proxy instead.
  • The following traps are obsolete:
    • hasOwn (bug 980565, Firefox 33).
    • getEnumerablePropertyKeys (bug 783829, Firefox 37)
    • getOwnPropertyNames (bug 1007334, Firefox 33)
    • keys (bug 1007334, Firefox 33)

value.title: Escape sequences
value.content:
• Octal escape sequences (\ followed by one, two, or three octal digits) are deprecated in string and regular expression literals.
  • The escape (en-US) and unescape (en-US) functions are deprecated. Use encodeURI, encodeURIComponent, decodeURI or decodeURIComponent to encode and decode escape sequences for special characters.

value.title: String methods
value.content:
• HTML wrapper methods like String.prototype.fontsize (en-US) and String.prototype.big (en-US).
  • String.prototype.quote is removed from Firefox 37.
  • non standard flags parameter in String.prototype.search, String.prototype.match, and String.prototype.replace are deprecated.

value.title: Obsolete features
value.content: These obsolete features have been entirely removed from JavaScript and can no longer be used as of the indicated version of JavaScript.

value.title: Object
value.content:
Property Description
__count__ Returns the number of enumerable properties directly on a user-defined object.
__parent__ Points to an object's context.
Object.prototype.eval() Evaluates a string of JavaScript code in the context of the specified object.
Object.observe() Asynchronously observing the changes to an object.
Object.unobserve() Remove observers.
Object.getNotifier() Creates an object that allows to synthetically trigger a change.

value.title: Function
value.content:
Property Description
arity Number of formal arguments.

value.title: Array
value.content:
Property Description
Array.observe() Asynchronously observing changes to Arrays.
Array.unobserve() Remove observers.

value.title: Number
value.content: • Number.toInteger()

value.title: ParallelArray
value.content: • ParallelArray

value.title: Statements
value.content:
• for each...in is deprecated. Use for...of instead.
  • Destructuring for...in is deprecated. Use for...of instead.
  • let blocks and let expressions are obsolete.

value.title: E4X
value.content: See E4X for more information.

value.title: Sharp variables
value.content: See Sharp variables in JavaScript for more information.
